message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $140 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $125 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $125.  Would you consider meeting in the middle at $132?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I am still looking to keep the price under $132. I am willing to pay $128 for the product.
